commit.message:
Use HIR map instead of tcx in constant evaluator

Constant evaluator can be called while tcx is in construction.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@

+
+#![feature(associated_consts)]
+
+enum Enum<T: Trait> {
+    X = Trait::Number, //~ ERROR constant evaluation error
+}
+
+trait Trait {
+    const Number: i32 = 1;
+}
+
+fn main() {}
